Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2000 REGENCY PARKWAY DRIVE,SUITE 300, CARY, North Carolina, 27518, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Fathom Holdings Inc is a cloud-based, technology-driven platform-as-a-service company operating in the real estate industry. Its low-overhead business model leverages proprietary software platform for management of real estate brokerage back-office functions, without the cost of physical brick and mortar offices or of redundant personnel. The company recognizes revenue primarily through the commissions that its agents charge their clients.
